name: Mole in One
description:
Drag your finger to launch the mole into the hole.

Play against real people and become champion of your town, your county and even your country! How far can you progress in Mole in One?

Features:

- Pixel perfect physics
- Over 100 beautiful courses.
- Ability to play offline
- No timers, no 'lives'- just relaxing fun.

TIPS:
- In Practice mode, the amount of coins you get for each hole-in-one goes up and up, while you're on a perfect streak.
- There are always two opponents to choose from. Left one is easy and doesn't require many coins. Right one is hard, has higher entry fee, but gives you a bigger ratings boost if you win. So you have to weigh up the stats and choose your victim!

Please get in touch with info@poptacular.com if you have any feedback.
